name: df-pautN
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cpautN, cmpt(s0, universe, cab(s1, wa(wf1o(cv(s1), cfv(cpsubsp, cv(s0)), cfv(cpsubsp, cv(s0))), wral(s2, cfv(cpsubsp, cv(s0)), wral(s3, cfv(cpsubsp, cv(s0)), wb(wss(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wss(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cfv(cv(s1), cv(s3))))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ PAut =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s1 |((s1 :(PSubSp ` s0)‚Üî(PSubSp ` s0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà(PSubSp ` s0), ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà(PSubSp ` s0),(s2 ‚äÜ s3 ‚Üî(s1 ` s2)‚äÜ(s1 ` s3)))))})
comment: Define set of all projective automorphisms. This is the intended definition of automorphism in [Crawley] p. 112. (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-2012.)
